code:
class GarbageManager:
    def __init__(self):
        self.garbage_items = []

    def add_garbage(self, item):
        self.garbage_items.append(item)
    
    def list_garbage(self):
        for item in self.garbage_items:
            print(item)
    
    def collect_garbage(self):
        self.garbage_items = []
        print("Garbage collected successfully.")

    def dispose_garbage(self, item):
        if item in self.garbage_items:
            self.garbage_items.remove(item)
        else:
            print("Item not found in garbage.")

# Simulate garbage collection process
garbage_manager = GarbageManager()
garbage_manager.add_garbage("apple_core")
garbage_manager.add_garbage("banana_peel")
garbage_manager.add_garbage("used_napkin")
garbage_manager.add_garbage("empty_bottle")

# List all the garbage items
garbage_manager.list_garbage()

# Dispose of a specific garbage item
garbage_manager.dispose_garbage("used_napkin")

# List remaining garbage items
garbage_manager.list_garbage()

# Collect all garbage
garbage_manager.collect_garbage()

# Attempt to dispose garbage that has already been collected
garbage_manager.dispose_garbage("apple_core")
